00009 // ############################################################################
00010 // fonction utilitaire pour xfigicize: determination de la couleur, du
00011 // style et de l'epaisseur dans le codage xfig.
00012 void xfig_parametres (Fl_Color color, int style, int width,
00013                       int *out_color, int *out_style, int *out_width) {
00014   switch ( color ) {
00015   case FL_RED: *out_color = 4; break;
00016   case FL_GREEN: *out_color = 2; break;
00017   case FL_YELLOW: *out_color = 6; break;
00018   case FL_BLUE: *out_color = 1; break;
00019   case FL_MAGENTA: *out_color = 5; break;
00020   case FL_CYAN: *out_color = 3; break;
00021   case FL_WHITE: *out_color = 7; break;
00022   case FL_DARK3: *out_color = 32; break;
00023   case FL_DARK2: *out_color = 33; break;
00024   case FL_DARK1: *out_color = 33; break;
00025   case FL_GRAY: case FL_GRAY0: *out_color = 35; break;
00026   case FL_LIGHT1: *out_color = 36; break;
00027   case FL_LIGHT2: *out_color = 37; break;
00028   case FL_LIGHT3: *out_color = 38; break;
00029   default: *out_color = 0; break; // defaults to black
00030   }
00031   switch ( style ) {
00032   case FL_DASH : *out_style = 1; break;
00033   case FL_DOT: *out_style = 2; break;
00034   case FL_DASHDOT: *out_style = 3; break;
00035   case FL_DASHDOTDOT: *out_style = 4; break;
00036   default: *out_style = 0; break; // defaults to solid
00037   }
00038   if ( width == 0 ) { *out_width = 1; } // system default
00039   else { *out_width = width; } }
00040 
00041 // fonction utilitaire pour xfigicize: calcul des coordonnees xfig. le
00042 // repere xfig est indirect, il est au coin superieur gauche.  la
00043 // resolution par defaut est de 1200 ppi
00044 int xfig_x (double x) { return (int) (1200 * x); }
00045 int xfig_y (double y) { return (int) (-1200 * y); }
00046 
00047

00051 // constructeur(s)
00052 FLTK_Graphic_Object::FLTK_Graphic_Object (Fl_Color _color,
00053                                           int _style, int _width)
00054 { color = _color; style = _style; width = _width; }

00057 // ############################################################################
00058 // Class FLTK_Point
00059 // ############################################################################
00060 // constructeur(s)
00061 FLTK_Point::FLTK_Point (double _x, double _y, Fl_Color _color, int _width) 
00062   : FLTK_Graphic_Object (_color, FL_SOLID, _width)
00063 { x = _x; y = _y; }
00064 
00065 // affichage graphique de l'objet
00066 void FLTK_Point::draw (FLTK_Display *display)
00067 {
00068   double unit_size = display->get_unit_size ();
00069   double scroll_x = display->get_scroll_x ();
00070   double scroll_y = display->get_scroll_y ();
00071   double _x = world_to_display_x (x, unit_size, scroll_x);
00072   double _y = world_to_display_y (y, unit_size, scroll_y);
00073   Fl_Color old_color = fl_color ();
00074   fl_color (color);
00075   fl_line_style (style, width);
00076   fl_point ((int)_x, (int)_y);
00077   fl_line_style (0);
00078   fl_color (old_color); }
00079 
00080 // affichage alphanumerique des attributs de l'objet
00081 void FLTK_Point::print ()
00082 { cout << "Point: " << x << ", " << y << endl; }
00083 
00084 // conversion de l'objet en objets xfig
00085 void FLTK_Point::xfigicize (ofstream &output) {
00086   int out_color, out_style, out_width;
00087   xfig_parametres (color, style, width, &out_color, &out_style, &out_width);
00088   int _x = xfig_x (x);
00089   int _y = xfig_y (y);
00090   output << "# point: " << x << ", " << y << endl; 
00091   output << "2 1 " << out_style << " " << out_width << " " << out_color
00092          << " -1 100 0 -1 0.0 0 0 -1 0 0 1" << endl;
00093   output << "     " << _x << " " << _y << endl; }

00096 // ############################################################################
00097 // Class FLTK_Cross
00098 // ############################################################################
00099 // constructeur(s)
00100 FLTK_Cross::FLTK_Cross (double _x, double _y, double _size, 
00101                         Fl_Color _color, int _style, int _width) 
00102   : FLTK_Graphic_Object (_color, _style, _width)
00103 { x = _x; y = _y; size = _size; }
00104 
00105 // affichage graphique de l'objet
00106 void FLTK_Cross::draw (FLTK_Display *display)
00107 {
00108   double unit_size = display->get_unit_size ();
00109   double scroll_x = display->get_scroll_x ();
00110   double scroll_y = display->get_scroll_y ();
00111   double x1 = world_to_display_x (x - size, unit_size, scroll_x);
00112   double x2 = world_to_display_x (x + size, unit_size, scroll_x);
00113   double y1 = world_to_display_y (y - size, unit_size, scroll_y);
00114   double y2 = world_to_display_y (y + size, unit_size, scroll_y);
00115   Fl_Color old_color = fl_color ();
00116   fl_color (color);
00117   fl_line_style (style, width);
00118   fl_line (x1, y1, x2, y2);
00119   fl_line (x1, y2, x2, y1);
00120   fl_line_style (0);
00121   fl_color (old_color); }
00122 
00123 // affichage alphanumerique des attributs de l'objet
00124 void FLTK_Cross::print () {
00125   cout << "Cross: " << x << ", " << y << ", " << size << endl; }
00126 
00127 // conversion de l'objet en objets xfig
00128 void FLTK_Cross::xfigicize (ofstream &output) {
00129   int out_color, out_style, out_width;
00130   xfig_parametres (color, style, width, &out_color, &out_style, &out_width);
00131   int x1 = xfig_x (x - size);
00132   int x2 = xfig_x (x + size);
00133   int y1 = xfig_y (y - size);
00134   int y2 = xfig_y (y + size);
00135   output << "# cross: " << x << ", " << y << ", " << size << endl; 
00136   // premiere branche de la croix
00137   output << "2 1 " << out_style << " " << out_width << " " << out_color
00138          << " -1 100 0 -1 0.0 0 0 -1 0 0 2" << endl;
00139   output << "     " << x1 << " " << y1  << " " << x2  << " " << y2 << endl;
00140   // deuxieme branche de la croix
00141   output << "2 1 " << out_style << " " << out_width << " " << out_color
00142          << " -1 100 0 -1 0.0 0 0 -1 0 0 2" << endl;
00143   output << "     " << x1 << " " << y2  << " " << x2  << " " << y1 << endl; }

00156 void FLTK_Plus::draw (FLTK_Display *display)

00160   double scroll_y = display->get_scroll_y ();

00162   double x1 = world_to_display_x (x - size, unit_size, scroll_x);
00163   double x2 = world_to_display_x (x + size, unit_size, scroll_x);
00164   double y0 = world_to_display_y (y, unit_size, scroll_y);
00165   double y1 = world_to_display_y (y - size, unit_size, scroll_y);
00166   double y2 = world_to_display_y (y + size, unit_size, scroll_y);
00167   Fl_Color old_color = fl_color ();
00168   fl_color (color);
00169   fl_line_style (style, width);
00170   fl_line (x1, y0, x2, y0);
00171   fl_line (x0, y1, x0, y2);
00172   fl_line_style (0);
00173   fl_color (old_color); }

00245 // ############################################################################
00246 // Class FLTK_Arc
00247 // ############################################################################
00248 // constructeur(s)
00249 FLTK_Arc::FLTK_Arc (double _x1, double _y1, double _x2, double _y2, 
00250                     double _xc, double _yc, double _radius, bool _ccw,
00251                     Fl_Color _color, int _style, int _width)
00252   : FLTK_Graphic_Object (_color, _style, _width)
00253 {
00254   x1 = _x1; y1 = _y1; x2 = _x2; y2 = _y2;  xc = _xc; yc = _yc;
00255   radius = _radius; ccw = _ccw;
00256   alpha1 = twopify (atan2 ((y1 - yc), (x1 - xc)));
00257   alpha2 = twopify (atan2 ((y2 - yc), (x2 - xc)));
00258   if (alpha1 < alpha2)
00259     if ( ccw )
00260       { length = (alpha2 - alpha1) * radius; }
00261     else
00262       { length = (2* Pi - alpha2 + alpha1) * radius; }
00263   else
00264     if ( ccw )
00265       { length = (2* Pi + alpha2 - alpha1) * radius; }
00266     else
00267       { length = (alpha1 - alpha2) * radius; }
00268 }
00269  
00270 // affichage de l'objet dans le widget graphique display
00271 void FLTK_Arc::draw (FLTK_Display *display)
00272 { 
00273   double _xc = world_to_display_x (xc, display->get_unit_size (),
00274                                    display->get_scroll_x ());
00275   double _yc = world_to_display_y (yc, display->get_unit_size (),
00276                                    display->get_scroll_y ());
00277   double box_width = world_to_display_x (radius, display->get_unit_size (), 0);
00278   double _alpha1 = degrees (alpha1);
00279   double _alpha2 = degrees (alpha2);
00280 
00281   Fl_Color old_color = fl_color ();
00282   fl_color (color);
00283   fl_line_style (style, width);
00284   if (_alpha1 < _alpha2)
00285     if ( ccw )
00286       { fl_arc ((_xc - box_width), (_yc - box_width), 
00287                 2 * box_width, 2 * box_width,
00288                 _alpha1, _alpha2); }
00289     else
00290       { fl_arc ((_xc - box_width), (_yc - box_width), 
00291                 2 * box_width, 2 * box_width,
00292                 _alpha2, _alpha1 + 360); }
00293   else
00294     if ( ccw )
00295       { fl_arc ((_xc - box_width), (_yc - box_width), 
00296                 2 * box_width, 2 * box_width,
00297                 _alpha1, _alpha2 + 360); }
00298     else
00299       { fl_arc ((_xc - box_width), (_yc - box_width), 
00300                 2 * box_width, 2 * box_width,
00301                 _alpha1, _alpha2); }
00302   fl_line_style (0);
00303   fl_color (old_color);
00304 }
00305 
00306 // affichage alphanumerique des attributs de l'objet
00307 void FLTK_Arc::print () { 
00308   cout << "Arc: " << x1 << ", " << y1 << " -> " << x2 << ", " << y2 
00309        << ", centre " << xc << ", " << yc << ", rayon " << radius 
00310        << ",  ccw " << ccw << ", angles (radians) " 
00311        << alpha1 << ", " << alpha2 << ", angles (degres) "
00312        << degrees (alpha1) << ", " << degrees (alpha2) << endl; }
00313 
00314 // conversion de l'objet en objets xfig
00315 void FLTK_Arc::xfigicize (ofstream &output) {
00316   int out_color, out_style, out_width;
00317   xfig_parametres (color, style, width, &out_color, &out_style, &out_width);
00318   float _xc = 1200 * xc;        // xfig demande un float dans ce cas
00319   float _yc = -1200 * yc;
00320   int _x1 = xfig_x (x1);
00321   int _x2 = xfig_x (x2);
00322   int _y1 = xfig_y (y1);
00323   int _y2 = xfig_y (y2);
00324   int _ccw;
00325   if ( ccw ) { _ccw = 1; } else { _ccw = 0; }
00326   // calcul d'un point intermediaire
00327   double delta, xi, yi;
00328   if (alpha1 < alpha2)
00329     if ( ccw )
00330       { delta = (alpha1 + alpha2) /2; }
00331     else
00332       { delta = (alpha1 + alpha2) /2 + Pi; }
00333   else
00334     if ( ccw )
00335       { delta = (alpha1 + alpha2) /2 + Pi; }
00336     else
00337       { delta = (alpha1 + alpha2) /2; }
00338   xi = xc + radius * cos (delta);
00339   yi = yc + radius * sin (delta);
00340   int _xi = xfig_x (xi);
00341   int _yi = xfig_y (yi);
00342   output << "# arc: " << x1 << ", " << y1 << " -> " << x2 << ", " << y2 
00343          << ", centre " << xc << ", " << yc << ", rayon " << radius 
00344          << ",  ccw " << ccw << ", angles (radians) " 
00345          << alpha1 << ", " << alpha2 << ", angles (degres) "
00346          << degrees (alpha1) << ", " << degrees (alpha2) << endl;  
00347   output << "5 1 " << out_style << " " << out_width << " " << out_color
00348          << " -1 100 0 -1 0.0 0 " << _ccw << " 0 0 " 
00349          << _xc << " " << _yc << " " 
00350          << _x1 << " " << _y1 << " " 
00351          << _xi << " " << _yi << " " 
00352          << _x2 << " " << _y2 << endl; }
00353

00355 // ############################################################################
00356 // Class FLTK_Circle
00357 // ############################################################################
00358 // constructeur(s)
00359 FLTK_Circle::FLTK_Circle (double _xc, double _yc, double _radius,
00360                         Fl_Color _color, int _style, int _width) 
00361   : FLTK_Graphic_Object (_color, _style, _width)
00362 {
00363   xc = _xc; yc = _yc; radius = _radius;  
00364 }
00365 
00366 // affichage de l'objet dans le widget graphique display
00367 void FLTK_Circle::draw (FLTK_Display *display) {
00368   double _xc = world_to_display_x (xc, display->get_unit_size (),
00369                                    display->get_scroll_x ());
00370   double _yc = world_to_display_y (yc, display->get_unit_size (),
00371                                    display->get_scroll_y ());
00372   double box_width = world_to_display_x (radius, display->get_unit_size (), 0);
00373 
00374   Fl_Color old_color = fl_color ();
00375   fl_color (color);
00376   fl_line_style (style, width);
00377   fl_arc ((_xc - box_width), (_yc - box_width), 
00378           2 * box_width, 2 * box_width, 0, 360);
00379   fl_line_style (0);
00380   fl_color (old_color); 
00381 }
00382 
00383 // affichage alphanumerique des attributs de l'objet
00384 void FLTK_Circle::print () {
00385   cout << "Circle: (" << xc << ", " << yc << "), rayon " << radius << endl; }
00386 
00387 // conversion de l'objet en objets xfig
00388 void FLTK_Circle::xfigicize (ofstream &output) {
00389   int out_color, out_style, out_width;
00390   xfig_parametres (color, style, width, &out_color, &out_style, &out_width);
00391   int _xc = xfig_x (xc);
00392   int _yc = xfig_y (yc);
00393   int _radius = xfig_x (radius);
00394   int _x = xfig_x (xc + radius);
00395   int _y = xfig_y (yc);
00396   output << "# circle: (" << xc << ", " << yc << "), rayon " << radius << endl;
00397   output << "1 3 " << out_style << " " << out_width << " " << out_color
00398          << " -1 100 0 -1 0.0 1 0.0 " << _xc << " " << _yc << " "
00399          << _radius << " " << _radius << " " << _xc << " " << _yc << " "
00400          << _x << " " << _y << endl;
00401 }

00404 // ############################################################################
00405 // Class FLTK_Clothoid
00406 // ############################################################################
00407 // constructeur(s)
00408 FLTK_Clothoid::FLTK_Clothoid (double _x1, double _y1, 
00409                               double _theta1, double _kappa1, 
00410                               double _x2, double _y2, 
00411                               double _theta2, double _kappa2,
00412                               double _sigma, bool _forward,
00413                               double _length,double _step,
00414                               Fl_Color _color, int _style, int _width)
00415   : FLTK_Graphic_Object (_color, _style, _width) {
00416   x1 = _x1; y1 = _y1; theta1 = twopify (_theta1); kappa1 = _kappa1;
00417   x2 = _x2; y2 = _y2; theta2 = twopify (_theta2); kappa2 = _kappa2; 
00418   sigma = _sigma; forward = _forward; length = _length; step = _step; }
00419 
00420 // affichage de l'objet dans le widget graphique display
00421 void FLTK_Clothoid::draw (FLTK_Display *display)
00422 {
00423   double nb_steps = floor (length / step);
00424   double x_f, y_f, theta_f, kappa_f;
00425 
00426   Fl_Color old_color = fl_color ();
00427   fl_color (color);
00428   fl_line_style (style, width);
00429   fl_begin_line ();
00430   fl_vertex (world_to_display_x (x1, display->get_unit_size (),
00431                                  display->get_scroll_x ()), 
00432              world_to_display_y (y1, display->get_unit_size (),
00433                                  display->get_scroll_y ()));
00434   for (int i = 1; i <= nb_steps; i++)
00435     {
00436       end_of_clothoid (x1, y1, theta1, kappa1, sigma, forward, i * step,
00437                        &x_f, &y_f, &theta_f, &kappa_f);
00438       fl_vertex (world_to_display_x (x_f, display->get_unit_size (),
00439                                      display->get_scroll_x ()), 
00440                  world_to_display_y (y_f, display->get_unit_size (),
00441                                      display->get_scroll_y ()));
00442     }
00443   fl_vertex (world_to_display_x (x2, display->get_unit_size (),
00444                                  display->get_scroll_x ()), 
00445              world_to_display_y (y2, display->get_unit_size (),
00446                                  display->get_scroll_y ()));
00447   fl_end_line ();
00448   fl_line_style (0);
00449   fl_color (old_color); }
00450 
00451 // affichage alphanumerique des attributs de l'objet
00452 void FLTK_Clothoid::print () {
00453   cout << "Clotoide: " << x1 << ", " << y1 << ", " 
00454        << degrees (theta1) << ", " << kappa1 << " -> " 
00455        << x2 << ", " << y2 << ", " 
00456        << degrees (theta2) << ", " << kappa2 << ", sigma " << sigma;
00457   if ( forward ) { cout << ", forward"; } else { cout << ", backward"; } 
00458   cout << ", longueur " << length << ", step " << step << endl; }
00459 
00460 // conversion de l'objet en objets xfig
00461 void FLTK_Clothoid::xfigicize (ofstream &output) {
00462   int out_color, out_style, out_width;
00463   xfig_parametres (color, style, width, &out_color, &out_style, &out_width);
00464   double nb_steps = floor (length / step);
00465   double _x, _y, _theta, _kappa;
00466 
00467   output << "# clotoide: " << x1 << ", " << y1 << ", " 
00468          << degrees (theta1) << ", " << kappa1 << " -> " 
00469          << x2 << ", " << y2 << ", " 
00470          << degrees (theta2) << ", " << kappa2 << ", sigma " << sigma;
00471   if ( forward ) { output << ", forward"; } else { output << ", backward"; } 
00472   output << ", longueur " << length << ", step " << step << endl; 
00473   output << "2 1 " << out_style << " " << out_width << " " << out_color
00474          << " -1 100 0 -1 0.0 0 0 -1 0 0 " << nb_steps + 2 << endl;
00475 
00476   _x = xfig_x (x1); _y = xfig_y (y1);
00477   output << "     " << _x << " " << _y;
00478   for (int i = 1; i <= nb_steps; i++)
00479     {
00480       end_of_clothoid (x1, y1, theta1, kappa1, sigma, forward, i * step,
00481                        &_x, &_y, &_theta, &_kappa);
00482       
00483       _x = xfig_x (_x); _y = xfig_y (_y);
00484       output  << " " << _x << " " << _y;
00485     }
00486   _x = xfig_x (x2); _y = xfig_y (y2);
00487   output << " " << _x << " " << _y << endl;;
00488 }
